TEST.0.title: 2023 North Carolina Division C Regional 3
TEST.0.customHeader:
Names of participants: (Please print neatly)

 
 
 
School Name:

Check your team:  ◻ Varsity     ◻ JV1      JV2     ◻ JV3

Warning: Do not open this packet until given permission to do so.

Note: There are useful notes after this page.

CIPHER.50.cipherString: There are in fact two things, science and opinion; the former begets knowledge, the later ignorance.
CIPHER.50.question: The following quote has been encoded as an Aristocrat.  What does it say?

CIPHER.74.cipherString: I'm in the mood to multiply
CIPHER.74.question: Decode this Hill cipher which was encoded using a keyword of FLUX.

CIPHER.63.cipherString: The history of art is the history of revivals.
CIPHER.63.question: A quote by Samuel Butler has been encoded using the Morbit Cipher for you to decode. You are told that 3=–●, 4=–×, 5=––, 6=●×, 7=●–

CIPHER.61.cipherString: The important thing is not to stop questioning.
CIPHER.61.question: A quote by Albert Einstein has been encoded using the Pollux Cipher for you to decode. You are told that 1=–, 3=–, 5=×, 7=–, 9=●

CIPHER.68.question: Solve the following Cryptarithm to decode what 897154617 says.

CIPHER.57.cipherString: What did the light bulb say to the switch? "You turn me on."
CIPHER.57.question: You found a note with the following words on it.  It turns out that it is a Baconian cipher.  What does it decode to?

CIPHER.71.cipherString: It is through cooperation, rather than conflict, that your greatest successes will be derived.
CIPHER.71.question: The following quote by Ralph Charell has been encoded as an Aristocrat using a K1 alphabet.  What was the Key Phrase used to encode the cipher?

CIPHER.64.cipherString: Share your knowledge. It is a way to achieve immortality.
CIPHER.64.question: A quote from the Dalai Lama XIV has been encoded using the Fractionated Morse Cipher for you to decode. You are told that the quote ends with LITY.  What did they say?

CIPHER.67.question: Solve the following Cryptarithm in order to determine what 8266247 02134536 says.

CIPHER.70.cipherString: No matter how your heart is grieving, if you keep on believing, the dreams that you wish will come true.
CIPHER.70.question: A quote from the Walt Disney Company has been encoded using the Aristocrat Cipher with a K1 Key Phrase. What was the key phrase used to encode it?

CIPHER.59.cipherString: Ah! the clock is always slow; It is later than you think.
CIPHER.59.question: The following strange headlines encode a quote by Robert W. Service using a Baconian cipher. You are told that the deciphered text ends with HINK

CIPHER.69.cipherString: The level of success you achieve will be in direct proportion to the depth of your commitment.
CIPHER.69.question: The following quote by Roy T. Bennett has been encoded as an Aristocrat using a K3 keyword.  What was the keyword used to encode it?

CIPHER.62.cipherString: I think therefore I can't get anything done.
CIPHER.62.question: A quote has been encoded using the Morbit Cipher for you to decode. You are told that 1=●×, 2=––, 3=–×, 4=–●, 5=●●

CIPHER.55.cipherString: Regret is one the scariest words in any language and success is one of the most beautiful ones. What are you waiting for?
CIPHER.55.question: A quote by Farshad Asl has been encoded as an Aristocrat using a K1 keyword.  What did they say?

CIPHER.66.cipherString: Science is the process that takes us from confusion to understanding.
CIPHER.66.question: The following quote by Brian Greene has been encoded with the Porta Cipher with a keyword of TREK. What did he say?

CIPHER.58.cipherString: A cauliflower is a plant explosion in extremely slow motion.
CIPHER.58.question: The following symbols encode a phrase using a Baconian Cipher.  What does it decode to?

CIPHER.52.cipherString: It is a sign of our power, and our criminal folly, that we can pollute the vast ocean and are doing so.
CIPHER.52.question: The following quote by Isaac Asimov has been encoded as an Aristocrat using a K1 alphabet.  What does it decode to?

CIPHER.60.cipherString: La mayoría de las personas pierden la oportunidad porque está vestida con un mono y parece trabajo.
CIPHER.60.question: A quote by Thomas Edison has been translated into Spanish and encoded as an Aristocrat using an English K1 alphabet.  What was the Spanish quote?
CIPHER.60.translation: Opportunity is missed by most people because it is dressed in overalls and looks like work.

CIPHER.53.cipherString: Those things which I am saying now may be obscure, yet they will be made clearer in their proper place.
CIPHER.53.question: A quote by Nicolaus Copernicus has been encoded as an Aristocrat using a K2 alphabet.  What did they say?

CIPHER.65.cipherString: Don't give up when you're disappointed, good things could still happen.
CIPHER.65.question: The following quote from D.L. Lewis needs to be decoded with the Porta Cipher using a keyword of KITE

CIPHER.54.cipherString: Theirs a nowledge tath is beynod teh mnid adn the intellect, it is the wisdum of consciousness.
CIPHER.54.question: Your friend who can't spell or type very well is trying to offer you some advice which has then been encoded as an Aristocrat using a K1 alphabet.  What did they actually type in?

CIPHER.51.cipherString: The present contains nothing more than the past, and what is found in the effect was already in the cause.
CIPHER.51.question: A quote by Henri Bergson has been encoded as an Aristocrat.  What did they say?

CIPHER.73.question: Encode the following phrase by Lailah Gifty Akita as a Hill cipher with a keyword of JOLT.

CIPHER.72.cipherString: Conscience: the inner voice which warns us that someone may be looking.
CIPHER.72.question: The following observation by H. L. Mencken has been encoded as a Railfence using 5 rails and an unknown offset.  What does it say?

CIPHER.56.cipherString: Sometimes you're not ready to give the world quite what it wants. And that's okay, because the Earth is generously patient.
CIPHER.56.question: A quote by Jaree Francis has been encoded as a Patristocrat using a K1 alphabet.  What did they say?
